title: Daughter’s Heart - Novel Updates
genre: Gender Bender   School Life   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Depression   Female Protagonist   Male to Female
author: 乱世银娘
description:
Year 1999. Ordinary boy. An accident. an operation. Welcome to life as a girl.
... 
Author's Note: This novel is about everyday life. I would like to use this book to pay tribute to the classic transfigurations of the past, and I hope that we still have successors, instead of everyone just taking transfiguration as a gimmick.>
